title: The Mill on the Floss - Maggie is presented as

content.prompt: In this passage, Maggie is presented as

choices.label: a spiritual person who speaks out against her mother's materialism
a source of instability within this religious household
a young woman who is too intellectual for the devout time in which she lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
